title: Create Accessible Product Card
description: Build a product card that works perfectly with screen readers.
instructions: Create an AccessibleProductCard widget that displays a product image, name, price, and rating. The card should: (1) Use MergeSemantics to combine all content into one announcement, (2) Exclude the decorative star icons but announce the rating value, (3) Be tappable with proper button semantics, (4) Have a minimum touch target of 48x48 dp.

hints.text: Wrap the entire card in MergeSemantics to combine all child semantics into one announcement
Use Semantics with button: true and onTap to make the card properly accessible
For the stars, use Semantics with excludeSemantics: true and provide a label like 'Rating: 4.5 out of 5 stars'

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to exclude decorative star icons from semantics
commonMistakes.consequence: Screen reader announces 'star, star, star, star, star' instead of the rating value
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap stars in Semantics with excludeSemantics: true and provide a meaningful label

commonMistakes.mistake: Not using MergeSemantics for the card
commonMistakes.consequence: Screen reader announces each element separately, making navigation cumbersome
commonMistakes.correction: Use MergeSemantics to combine all content into one cohesive announcement
